parameters.name: Comment
parameters.description: The purpose or objective of the SQL review. This reduces unnecessary communication.

parameters.name: RelatedUserList
parameters.description: The stakeholders involved in this operation. All the specified stakeholders can view the ticket details and take part in the approval process. Irrelevant users other than DMS administrators and database administrators (DBAs) are not allowed to view the ticket details.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description: The ID of the tenant. You can call the [GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~) or [ListUserTenants](~~198074~~) operation to obtain the tenant ID.
